desc: Your complete Canadian Pottery Supply House. We sell a wide variety of clay, glaze, pottery tools and pottery equipment. From the beginner to the production potter, we are here to support all of your pottery needs in both pottery supplies and consultations.

layout.text: Where potters go for high quality products and exceptional service.

Your complete Canadian Pottery Supply House. We sell a wide variety of clay, glaze, pottery tools and pottery equipment. From the beginner to the production potter, we are here to support all of your pottery needs in both pottery supplies and support.
